name: Rise to Monopolization
description:
Make your way from a simple TV fixing guy from the owner of a large company that has dominance over everything that profits in this Idle Clicker game.

This game is being developed in Game Jolt as well, and there you will have a scoreboard to be ranked up!

Game Jolt Version:

https://gamejolt.com/games/risetomonopolization/543229

Changelog:

;0.6.0 - 14/10/2020(First Itch.io version):

-Saving now saves upgrades and buildings

-New building:Mine

-New upgrades:For Delivery Workers
